summary: Built the forward deployed engineering function and delivered AI-driven demos that unlocked new enterprise revenue.
highlights: Defined the forward deployed engineering function, including role scope, hiring process, and candidate evaluation.
Led technical implementation of Summation's AI-powered financial assistant for a 6-figure enterprise contract serving 20K+ employees.
Developed a Python-based CLI with OpenAI Deep Research to generate realistic synthetic financial datasets and fully customized demo environments in under 30 minutes.
Equipped sales with production-ready demos populated with AI-generated business insights, accelerating enterprise deal cycles.

summary: Founded and scaled a YC-backed enterprise SaaS platform for homebuilders, leading product, engineering, and GTM from inception.
highlights: Grew the company from idea to $300K+ ACV with multiple top-tier homebuilder customers.
Hired, led, and mentored a six-person engineering team while establishing technical culture and scalable development practices.
Architected and shipped the initial white-labeled B2B2C web and mobile platform for enterprise homebuilders.
Delivered multiple product lines, including an all-in-one closing platform, builder–buyer chat app, and LLM-powered data ingestion and cleaning tooling.
Scaled infrastructure and security to meet enterprise-grade performance requirements while accelerating release cadence.

summary: Led Opendoor's data platform strategy and execution, powering pricing, risk, and operations through resilient infrastructure.
highlights: Served as tech lead for Data Infrastructure, managing the Kubernetes-based platform for all Spark/ML workloads with hundreds of users and over $1M/month cloud spend.
Designed and implemented the Go/Postgres backend that ingested live MLS data with <5 minute latency, normalizing formats and serving web/mobile via Elasticsearch, gRPC, and GraphQL APIs.
Led architecture of the enterprise data warehouse—ETL pipelines, modeling, testing, and deployment—while migrating from Google Cloud (BigQuery, GCS) to AWS (RDS, S3, Snowflake).
Maintained and enhanced data-serving microservices, including address standardization, geospatial datasets (PostGIS), and normalized realtor databases for partner programs.
Partnered with program, data science, and operations teams to execute zero-downtime migrations, cut ML workflow latency and cost, and deliver validated data for new city launches.

summary: Delivered data products that unlocked company-wide insights and powered intelligent user features.
highlights: Built the first centralized, real-time KPI dashboard, scraping and normalizing Amplitude data to increase visibility into growth metrics.
Developed the backend API for the “auto-text” feature using the Imagga recognition API and NLP libraries to recommend contextual copy to users.
